name: Survivors of Borridor
description: Survivors of Borridor is a fast-paced topdown couch co-op survival PC game. It uniquely allows players to join using their smartphone browser and turn it into a controller for their character. You and your crew have crashed on one of the most dangerous and hostile habitable planets in the galaxy..
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista SP1 Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with shader model 4.0 capabilities Storage: 200 MB available space
